pros: Flexibility, positive work environment, everyone is polite
cons: Stress at times when working with other departments on/ off campus

pros: This is a retirement community for wealthy seniors. Some of them are humble and nice. You can use the workout room and swimming pool. Food service employees receive a weekly allowance for food purchases.
cons: The pay is nowhere close to being fair in light of the workload. PTO was two dollars less than the hourly rate for work (this was not disclosed during the hiring process.)
Leadership changes within the organization was disappointing

review_title: Good job and benefits. Management needs some work
pros:
Pay was good 
Nice residents
Great yearly bonuses
Good benefits
cons:
Management can be difficult to work with.
High turnover rate

review_title: Inclusive, Welcoming, Good Pay and Rewarding
pros:
Compensation and benefits package
Inclusive and welcoming environment
Great team members to work with
cons:
Lots of hard work, but rewarding
Difficult clients and families

pros: Good hours, friendly staff. Good benefits
cons: If your part-time you can't work full time hours.

pros: The whole community feels like family.  When an employee or resident is struggling with personal issues, Givens goes above and beyond to help in any way they can.  The benefits are great and the work environment, from my experience, is welcoming and supportive.  I have never had the flexibility in schedule or the support from my superiors that I have at Givens Estates.  It is also a beautiful campus with excellent hiking trails and lots of wildlife.
cons: Dependent upon department, turnover can be a little high which can be disruptive to other staff and have managers spending too much time hiring.  Pay rates are competitive but can lag behind other similar businesses in the area.  However, yearly cost of living raises are almost guaranteed which is not always the case with other companies.

review_title: Great place to be of heartfelt service to others .
pros: You are appreciated and valued by the residents.  You are a part of a community. Your service makes a difference.
cons: Establishing meaningful, long term relationships with residents and  feeling that your are part of an extended family is discouraged by management.

review_title: Great opportunities to grow and advance.
pros: Great place where everyone works together in collaboration. The organization invests in it's team members with opportunities to further education, experience and advance to positions of greater responsibility.
cons: Hard work with long hours, but gratifying working with grateful residents.

review_title: Givens Estates is a great employer
cons: cold in winter when delivery trucks come in

job_title: Anonymous Employee in West Asheville, NC

pros: Well regulated with standards and laws
